DOC.brief_title: Exposure Study Comparing 3 Routes Methotrexate ( MTX ) Administration
DOC.detailed_description: To compare pharmacokinetic ( PK ) profile methotrexate ( MTX ) follow subcutaneous ( SC ) injection MTX use Vibex device obtain SC injection MTX without use device obtain intramuscular ( IM ) injection MTX adult subject rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) .
DOC.criteria: Male female > 18 year age diagnose Rheumatoid Arthritis ( RA ) . Chronic acute renal disease Any clinically significant disease disorder , opinion investigator , might put subject risk
